description: [APT39](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0087) has modified and used customized versions of publicly-available tools like PLINK and [Mimikatz](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0002).(Citation: BitDefender Chafer May 2020)(Citation: IBM ITG07 June 2019)
